## Installation with r-universe

MALECOT can be installed using [plasmogenepi.r-universe](https://plasmogenepi.r-universe.dev/MALECOT) with the following command:

```
# Install MALECOT in R:
install.packages('MALECOT', repos = c('https://plasmogenepi.r-universe.dev', 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))
```
